message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. I believe it's a great deal for both of us, given its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I believe that's a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.

Bob, I understand your perspective. While I'm willing to negotiate, $10,500 is a bit too low for me. Let's compromise. I'm willing to sell it for $11,000. This price still leaves you with a good deal and allows me to get closer to my desired price.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,750? I think that's a fair price for both of us.

Bob, I appreciate your continued interest. While I value your offer, $10,750 doesn't quite meet my minimum.  I'm willing to go down to $10,900 as a final compromise.  Let me know if you're interested.
I understand your position, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers. Would you consider selling it to me for $10,800?
